Trigger A bonded creature within range would die.

Your network catches the soul of a bonded creature before it departs and forcefully resuscitates their body with a jolt of energy. You prevent the target from dying and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Transfer Vitality] to the triggering ally. The target becomes immune to vital rebirth for 24 hours. Vital rebirth has no effect if the triggering effect was @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Disintegrate], @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Promession], or a death effect. You must have at least 1 Hit Point in your vitality network to cast this spell.
